titles.title: To correct the classification of timing apparatus with opto-electronic display only.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/17/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide for the tariff treatment of time-recorders that are battery or AC powered with opto-electronic display only. Provides for retroactive application of this Act, upon request filed by a certain deadline, for liquidation or relinquishment of any entry or withdrawal on or after January 1, 1993, and before the effective date of this Act.
